评论详情: Ordene talla m parecia xl
I love this dress! It's so comfortable and can be worn as a lounge dress or can be dressed up as well. I have gotten so many compliments wearing it. I am 5'5 and 150lbs and got a L.
I love the fabric, the fit and the color!

I'd like to have this in every color, but in two sizes smaller.  I ordered XL because I have a little "heft" around the middle and thought I'd need the room... nope!  I look like a little kid in Mama's maternity sweat shirt... But I'm keeping it because it is comfortable and warm and I just love it!  I'll be buying at least one more!
It is a super cute fit.  Not a sexy dress but most definitely a comfortable one!  I would buy it in every color if I could!
Soft and warm fabric. Thickness is that of a hoodie, and is warm. Fits true to size.
Not flattering, weird cut and pockets

I'm 5'1" and a fairly busty fat person, so I went with Amazon's recommended XXL. That was a mistake. I should have looked closely at the pictures on the page and noticed the thin model's dress hits well above the knee, but the larger model's dress hits AT the knee. They used the exact same fit model and just scaled it up, as if all larger-bodied people are tall. If the dress had no shaping whatsoever, that would be adaptable, but instead there's a narrowing at the "waist" of the dress that hits where my hips are and then flares out again and the pockets are at mid-thigh, which is both unusable and unflattering.
Exactly what I was after. It is so soft and comfortable. I will be ordering more. Absolutely love it.
Great to wear around the house however not suitable for anything other than lounge wear. Super comfortable and soft though

I am 140 lbs , 5 feet 1 inch. I ordered size small. The sweater/ dress is at the line of my knees and this is the only positive thing I have to say. The material is polyester and is very low quality. It resembles the old sweater from a grandma's attic, not a modern dress/sweater to wear casually. Also, the pockets are way too low for my height. The neck line is very big and looks like I borrowed this thing from a person who washed it 100 times. I am definitely returning it.

评论概述: I want one in every color
评论详情: Surprisingly high-quality, substantial and soft. Pay attention to the positive reviews; I agree with everything they say.  I started with the caramel color, which is a lovely, warm terra cotta shade. I liked it so much I ordered several more colors. If Amazon keeps adding new colors (but please keep the original colors in stock!), I’ll keep ordering more. I also appreciate the extended size range. This one’s a winner!
Wore this dress to work today with a snazzy necklace. Got many compliments. It’s just sweatshirt lol
The good reviews persuaded me to buy it.  The S actually is way too big and feels like wearing a winter pajama.
Great Quality and fit
Very comfortable and it has pockets! I bought 2 in different colors.
Was waaaay too long. I am 5’2” and the length was below my calves.
Although I think the item I received was a return, but it appeared unworn so I kept it. It fit perfectly, very comfortable and cozy wear.
Fit well, sizing is accurate.

I paired a grey pullover with black leggings, and the outfit looked fantastic. However, the inside material of the pullover left lint all over my leggings, which was disappointing. While the style is great, the fabric quality could use improvement.

This dress is perfect for fall into early spring. A go to and feel god in, garment. The pictures on line, do not do any justice to this versatile garment! It is rather more of a lantern shape. Believe it, is COTTON! It holds it's shape after washing, remove from dryer when damp, shape on hanger to dry. Minimal to no shrinkage. Knee length to flatter figure. It does not look bulky. The fabric soft and warm against the skin and holds it's shape. I purchased the navy blue color and it is a rich deep blue that held through a washing. Wear with knee highs or tights. The sleeves are 3/4, the only drawback. I would prefer a long, or bell sleeve. Great value for the price!

I wear these for the trip when we go camping.  Warm and comfortable!  Not binding.  And very cute.  I'm 5'7" and about 135 lbs.  Pockets hit at just the right spot, length is great, fabric has just enough stretch but doesn't 'grow a butt' when I wear them.  Love love love.  Got 3 different colors!
Really great color and nice fleece fabric - great for fall and winter. Slightly large - you might order a size smaller unless you like dresses loose

评论概述: Was nice to learn it was a Sweatshirt dress
评论详情: Nice and warm for chilly mornings abd evenings on the porch...

I love these for lounging and sleeping. This year I bought 2 and they are the best yet. At 5'2" they fall below my knee. Minimal shrinkage with washing and drying. I would recommend them whether you want to wear them out or for lounging.  Follow the sizing chart, This cut is not meant to be fitted,
Great quality and true to size.
I love this shift casual and comfy dress and now I'm looking to purchase other colors if it's available!

This little dress is cute and comfortable. I always get compliments when I wear it.
This dress is beautiful in red & very soft ! Unfortunately, it runs large & doesn't shrink. I bought a small but it's too big for me.

评论概述: I’m giving five stars because I don’t like to give for or less
评论详情: I’m giving five stars because I don’t like to hurt businesses with reviews that are less than that unless the product is super terrible. It’s cute enough. I always appreciate a tunic style or short dress sweatshirt. However, the material is the cheaper kind of sweatshirt material, it’s more of a polyester. I bought the black and camel colored striped dress and it’s more of a Halloween orange and black.

This dress is extremely warm and cozy, great fabric great quality but is disappointing that it seems to be quite of a misfit, very baggy by the sleeves on top. The pockets feel comfortable and it’s very lightweight.
Love this dress except it runs big! I bought a am. Unfortunately there is no XS. So size down!

Fabric was nice. Small fit me - I’m 110# but I wouldn’t describe it as running large. I return it because of the neck line. Not a crew neck - it was wide and lower than a crew. Not at all flattering. Very disappointing.
The red is very bright. I typically wear a medium, I ordered a Large hoping for oversized look. It is very boxy and too big. I will re-order in my true size medium
I haven’t gotten to wear this yet, due to the East Tennessee heat, but I liked the fit enough that I ordered a second one!

Great fit and warmth on trip.  Did not shrink even after wash.  Size fit me perfectly
Fits really nice and it’s not too thick.
I ordered size XL because I'm busty. Well, the pockets were down to my knees! I do not recommend for 5'2 or shorter.
I love this sweater dress! It's super soft, and so warm. So comfortable too. It's perfectly sized and it is machine washable. Great for winter months. Highly recommend!
I like it but it runs a little big and long.  The pockets were too low size down

评论概述: Nice Cut, Flattering  I bought the black stipped on
评论详情: Waste of material could be awesome had it been sized right.  I will keep it and hope it shrinks after several wash and drying.  Like I said the cut is great - sizing confusing - go down one or two sizes, kinda dice roll.  I would say this is an iffy purchased based on sizing.  It could be XL or L - both show on tag.  It is huge either way.  Comfortable, although too big, I am keeping it as it is warm and does have a nice shape.  A true large would of been perfect.  Nice material, good cut bad sizing.

评论概述: Great dress, you get what you see
评论详情: This dress is exactly what I expected - a sweatshirt dress, nothing more, nothing less...but perfect! Some reviews mention pockets that can make the hips appear a bit wide - I can see that, but it doesn't affect my opinion of this dress. I still like it. If I'd ordered a size smaller, then it may be a problem. I am 5' 5", 180ish lbs, long torso. I was deciding between an L and XL and eventually ordered the L. The large fits well and I'll keep it. The XL would also be great, just more roomy. I plan to wear this when it gets chilly with sneakers or Dr. Martens boots.
Great thick fabric for winter, comfy! Size is accurate
This is insanely cute and rather thick and warm.

评论概述: Love this so much I bought two!
评论详情: Fabric is great. Pockets, yes! It’s cute, it’s comfy, and versatile. Wear it as lounge wear or out and about with some cute tennies or short boots. Washes up great too. No shrinkage. Love!
Soft, warm, with pockets!
I bought this for an Alaskan cruise. I paired it with some thick black leggings. It was cozy and comfortable, and I got lots of complements.

I bought this because the reviews said it was good. This dress is very boxy shaped. The sleeves and where they fall all completely unflattering for me at least. The material was rough and itchy. It's thick though. I found it to be really stiff even with movement. It seems to have good pickets though. I hope this helps.
Perfect for cold mornings. Cozy, well made. Beautiful blue. Size M. Haven't washed it yet.
Ordered size medium; however, it was too large to like the fit.  Even so, it met advertised requirements.
Nice fit, comfortable and good value.

I ordered every color! Every time I wear one of these dresses . Women look, compliment me of all ages and ask where did I buy it. I bought all of mine to big for me to get that baggy street wise look. Also because of that my sleeves come to my wrist.
Not cute at all. I donated it

I purchased five different colors and sizes. It's right to the size, light and warm, pockets position right for me, delivery services fast.  The price could be just a little lower.120 -130 lb, 5'5.  But with confidence.
Love the fabric, the color, just not the style and fit. I have rather standard measurements, this didn’t fit correctly.

评论概述: Comfy enough for work and home wear
评论详情: I love these “sweatshirt” dresses. I have several and wear them just about everywhere when pants are a little too warm. Must say they are much longer than the picture shows! I have had to shorten all the ones (3) so far I bought.

评论概述: Cut of dress for someone else
评论详情: This dress is too big for me.  The underarm fabric was cut too tight but the hip fabric was very large and stuck out to the side like mini wings.  Overall I looked like I was wearing maternity clothes.  Maybe if I got an item 1-2 sizes smaller, then it would fit better.  It was a good length and I liked the 3/4 length sleeves and deep pockets.

评论概述: I’m plus sized and this comfy dress makes me feel cute
评论详情: This is a simple sweatshirt dress.  The fabric is on the thicker side as you would expect with a sweatshirt but it’s still light enough to wear for Spring.  The sleeve length goes just past the elbow and it’s a bit poofy.  I like it - it makes it feel styled.  Pockets!  Deep enough for a phone.  I am a curvy girl and the dress has quite a bit of room.  It’s in my regular rotation now!
I got large, fits well with room to move, and comfy enough. Medium for a tighter fit would be okay.. but happy with it.. sleeves are 3/4! As described. But I would have preferred full sleeve.
Love this dress! Soft, comfortable and fits beautifully. Highly recommend.
It launders beautiful.  Keeps its shape and color.  Soft feels good on
Please make MORE of these and get the sizes back in stock! I’d like to buy more of these adorably comfy dresses that are perfect for home or going out.
Soft fabric,  nicely fitted, pockets! A winner.

This dress is sooooo comfortable. It always feels like I’m wearing a blanket whenever I put it on. And it is very warm and stylish. The only complaint is that it has a weird factory stench that hasn’t quite come out completely even after many scented washes. It’s still a great dress. I stand at 5’5” average height. The dress covers my knees when I sit down BUT I bought 3 sizes bigger to give me extra room and length.

At first I didn't like the silhouette but it's so comfy it's perfect. I'm short so I usually have to shorten dresses to look right on me (I'm 5', I like it to sit right below my knee, bought an XL). One cycle through the wash and dryer and it sat perfectly on me. So comfortable and easy
Fantastic dress loved it so much I bought one and almost every color!!

This item is made for tall women. I'm 5'1 and the waist area is too long for me. I look like a dwarf in this dress. I bought a smaller size thinking that it may look better, but no. Wish they made a petite version.

Love this dress!!! It is so comfy and looks great with tights and boots. Love the pockets. May buy it in another color. I sized up because my usual size was unavailable in the red, and it’s fine… I think it’s so loose that you can vary up or down a little in size with no worries.

this item is so outfitting and the sizing makes no sense. had to returned the first one it was way too big.  size down when it was still way too big and long.  The picture shows above the knee, mine came down to my calves and I'm 5'9
I love this dress. It is perfect for the cold weather. Warm and soft. I went up a size but I could have gone down one. Great for casual everyday wear.
Nice dress very ,very soft material.Although it's a little long for me (I'm 5'5) and the pockets are bulky I keep it for the softness of the material. Runs true to size
I love the fit and feel of the garment. It can be dressed up or down.

评论概述: The back liner material ruined my under clothes

The color I chose was on a deal. Beige. Very ugly, but didn't care. It was only 10 bucks. I knew I was just going to use it as pajamas and for that reason, it's great.
Washes okay.  Don't leave in dryer long.  Hang up to finish drying to prevent shrinking and also it just looks better.  Not something you want to wear out of the house.
Thought the French terry would be a better lighter weight

I returned this but really wanted to love it.  I think I should have sized up.  It “fit” but wasn’t as loose as I wanted.  It wasn’t tight or showing any unwanted bumps but the pockets would flare out and make me look wider.  I think a size up would help…but then not sure the overall fit would be what I wanted either

评论概述: Cozy & Fits as described on Size Chart
评论详情: This adorable dress is ideal for cooler weather. The fabric facing the skin is yummy fleecy soft, and it’s easy to care for. I am 5’5” and typically order Misses XXL or 1X from other brands depending on cut and fabrication. I prefer wearing dresses year-round because they are easy to move about in. This charming dress is easily accessorized with a vest, scarf, Sherpa bucket hat or French beret and crossbody, and I like the bootie and sock combination shown in the photo, so I’ll be trying that too.  Enjoy!
Easy to care feels do nice. Looks lovely.
LOVE this dress. I've worn it with leggings. It is very comfortable and warn. However...it is an overgrown sweatshirt and tends to be a bit dumpy. I'm still learning how to belt it BUT love it!!

I was excited to but these because they were inexpensive and looked cute. But I would save your money!!! These dresses are extremely bulky and unflattering. I felt ugly and uncomfortable in them. The fabric is a soft sweatshirt material and they are cheap, so if you just need something to maybe paint the house in, this would work. But don’t bother if you want to feel attractive and comfortable.

评论概述: beautiful comfortable dress except for plastic in seams
评论详情: This is a very flattering and soft dress.  It  was alightly big but likely will fit better after its washed.  I did not give it a 5 because it has plastic sewn into the shoulder seams which chaffs on my skin.  Therefore I had to take it off after 5 minutes of uncomfortableness.  I was able to cut the plastic out by half destroying the seams and I will see if the dress still works properly.
This dress was perfect for a Saturday afternoon football game on December 2nd in SC.  Just warm enough I didn’t need a jacket! Loved the pockets.  No need for a purse!
Will add more info after washing and drying. Love the pockets!!!
So comfy and you can wear it around the house, or dress it up with nice boots or jewelry.
Cute enough dress but it sheds lint EVERYWHERE. The return window closed, otherwise I'd be sending this back straight away.

The material is poor quality and it sheds. It ruined my day when I first wore it. Red material sticked my bra and tights, which was extremely painful to remove them because washing did not help. After washing this item two times there was still little red material everywhere. I eventually throwed it away. DO NOT BUY!!!
Bought 2 of these.  Love the material and the color is just as pictured.  Very comfortable fit
Ordered the XS and it still was huge and very box shaped and unflattering. Also - very odd but in the dress pockets was a Kleenex and a used rubber glove. So gross!

When I opened this it was clear that this was roomie and very casual.  I will probably use this for a night shirt or maybe with leggings to the grocery store.  It just not fitting or necessarily an attractive style for me and the material is like a very heavy sweatshirt.  May not be the best item for mild Fl winters.
It felt suffocating.
This Dress is very comfortable and just what I expected. I absolutely love the fit and it was exactly what I was looking for.

First off, the dress is extremely comfortable and cozy and it fits just right. It’s lined with a fleece-like material that makes it perfect for slightly chilly days/nights. Love the side pockets on the dress too. However, the fleece material is poor quality and it sheds EVERYWHERE after washing it the first time. Even after washing there was little white balls of lint everywhere. It’s pretty annoying and inconvenient to get the lint off.  I hope the shedding lessens and stops within the next wash or two. I like the dress but it definitely could be made better.
I really wanted to like this dress but the way it fit and the how the pockets made the dress lay just didn’t work at all.
